text: Aerial Gunner is a 1943 American World War II drama movie directed by William H. Pine and starring Chester Morris, Richard Arlen, Jimmy Lydon, Amelita Ward, Robert Mitchum, Dick Purcell. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies about aviation Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Aerial Gunner
